title: 11/26/2020 – Hour 3 – Are Tom Brady and Bruce Arians A Good Match?
itunes:title: 11/26/2020 – Hour 3 – Are Tom Brady and Bruce Arians A Good Match?
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker fill in for Dan Patrick and question if the Pittsburgh Steelers are being selfish by complaining about the NFL’s decision to postpone their game against the Ravens amid positive COVID-19 tests. They discuss Bruce Arians’ gripes with Tom Brady and get fired up over Brady’s past history of luck. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
